page.title: 19 ATTITUDES.
page.content: Two surveys were carried out 1)in the Shiremoor area and 2)the Killingworth area. The results were very similar. 90%of the people enjoyed living in their area because it was "central"i.e. near to the coast on the one hand and yet close to the city of Newcastle with its major shopping centre,Eldon Square the largest indoor shopping centre in Europe. In(1) the people liked the "village" effect left over from the mining days,the friendly neighbours and the nearness to the country. In(2) the majority liked the traffic free garths,the modern housing and the young,friendly people but many thought the place was insular,a concrete city (reference to the tower blocks)and had reputation.Vandelism and grafitti were a common concern in both area.
